long_description: With a full-length central channel and great padding, the SMP Hybrid bike saddle offers a supportive, long-lasting platform for any sort of riding. Soft and long-lasting synthetic cover offers a comfortable ride. Saddle shape features a full-length central channel to help redistribute body weight off of sensitive areas; raised rear supplies added support for pelvis. With a touch more padding than other SMP saddles, the Hybrid saddle offers increased comfort. Stainless-steel rails deliver a sturdy and supportive platform.
short_description: With a full-length central channel and great padding, the SMP Hybrid bike saddle offers a supportive, long-lasting platform for any sort of riding.
